name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 in Wick Editor
name_original: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 in Wick Editor
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog 2 in Wick Editor is a platformer game developed by Henry Stickmin BOIII. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Sonic the Hedgehog 2 in Wick Editor on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
